00010 #include "../GeneralInclude/CompilerSwitches.h"
00011 #include "../GeneralInclude/DebugSupport.h"
00012 #include "../GeneralInclude/ClassId.h"
00013 #include "../GeneralInclude/Constants.h"
00014 #include "../Base/CC_RootObject.h"
00015 #include "DC_FromFsmEvent.h"
00016 #include "CC_FSM.h"
00017 
00018 DC_FromFsmEvent::DC_FromFsmEvent(void) {
00019    startingState = -1;
00020    setClassId(ID_FROMFSMEVENT);
00021 }
00022 
00023 void DC_FromFsmEvent::setStartingState(TD_FsmStateIndex startingState) {
00024     assert( startingState >= 0 );
00025     this->startingState = startingState;
00026 }
00027 
00028 TD_FsmStateIndex DC_FromFsmEvent::getStartingState(void) const {
00029     assert( startingState >= 0 );
00030     return startingState;
00031 }
00032 
00033 bool DC_FromFsmEvent::isObjectConfigured(void) {
00034     return (DC_FsmEvent::isObjectConfigured() && startingState>=0 &&
00035             startingState<getTargetFsm()->getNumberOfStates());
00036 }
00037 
00038 TD_ActionOutcome DC_FromFsmEvent::doAction(void) {
00039     assert( isObjectConfigured() );
00040     if (getTargetFsm()->getCurrentState() == startingState)
00041         return DC_FsmEvent::doAction();
00042     else
00043         return ACTION_FAILURE;
00044 }
